jobDescription: Residential Electrician: We are currently hiring Apprentice Electricians with 4 - 7 years of experience in a residential environment. Candidates are encouraged to apply ASAP as we have an immediate need in the Saratoga Area. Qualified candidates will send an updated resume for consideration. Interviews are currently underway.  Please send your resume to brad@outsource.net for consideration. Residential Electrician Duties: Cutting, bending, threading and running electrical conduit materials  Pulling electrical wiring through electrical conduit  Terminating electrical panels, set fixtures, outlets, and various electrical devices  Installing and connecting wires to circuit breakers, transformers, outlets, or other components  and systems Residential electrician Qualifications: Familiar with the most updated NEC codes  Experience reading and interpreting blueprints  Current State License  Must consent to a pre-employment background and drug screen
